frontmatter.title: Project workflow with Web Compatibility team of Mozilla
frontmatter.description: The reporter is implemented as a standalone Web-extension, that leverages both standard Web-extension APIs as well as some Firefox-specific APIs that allows gathering more information, like taking a screenshot and collecting error messages from the JavaScript error console.
